body:
Oh well…

For once, the fact that it’s possible in Go doesnt mean we should continue down that road

Raphael

> Le 28 juil. 2016 à 21:21, Jonathan Amsterdam <notifications@github.com> a écrit :
> 
> @rgeronimi <https://github.com/rgeronimi> that's never been true:
> 
> func main() {
> fmt.Println(nil(3))
> }
> 
> func nil(nil int) int { return nil }
> 
> Try it: https://play.golang.org/p/nVmevXdJ9w <https://play.golang.org/p/nVmevXdJ9w>
> —
